author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
How did the MythBusters crew deal with Adam's rapid way of working, given how it frustrated Jamie? How did MythBusters decide which custom rigs to save after filming? The sea sickness episode resulted in successful homemade remedies; why weren't these used later by Adam and Grant during the Shark Week episodes? In this live stream excerpt Adam answers these questions from Tested members jimapollo, Farrell's Props and Patrick Hennessy, whom we thank for their support.

00:00 Crew dealing with Adam
04:00 Saving custom rigs
06:05 Sea sickness
07:51 Being a member

More MythBusters-related Q&A: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TSsoa9XBwGs&list=PLJtitKU0CAehaZdgrPRzjyGFSEQ8URiQl

Tested and Adam Savage Ts, stickers,
title: Was the MythBusters Crew Frustrated With Adam's Build Style?
